# Cloak of Resistance +4
## Overview
**Aura** faint abjuration; **CL** 12th

**Slot** shoulders

**Price** 16,000 gp

**Weight** 1 lb.

**Description**

This garment offers magic protection in the form of a +4 resistance bonus on all saving throws (Fortitude, Reflex, and Will).

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Resistance (Spell)|resistance]]*, creator’s caster level must be at least three times the cloak’s bonus

**Cost** 8,000 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 507
